products.title: Roasted Red Pepper Hummus
products.description: This delicious hummus is made with roasted red peppers and chickpeas, and is perfect for dipping vegetables or pita chips.

products.title: Butternut Squash Soup
products.description: A creamy and comforting soup made with roasted butternut squash and warm spices.
products.instructions: Roast butternut squash and onion. Blend with chicken stock and spices until smooth.

products.title: Creamy Mushroom Risotto
products.description: A rich and indulgent risotto made with earthy mushrooms and Parmesan cheese.
products.instructions: Saut√© mushrooms and onion. Add rice and wine. Gradually add broth until rice is cooked. Stir in Parmesan cheese.

products.title: Quinoa Stuffed Bell Peppers
products.description: A healthy and flavorful vegetarian dish made with quinoa, black beans, and bell peppers.
products.instructions: Cook quinoa. Mix with black beans, tomatoes, and spices. Stuff bell peppers and bake until tender.

products.title: Strawberry Cheesecake Bars
products.description: These cheesecake bars are made with a graham cracker crust and topped with fresh strawberries.
products.instructions: Mix cream cheese, sugar, and vanilla. Press graham cracker crust into pan. Pour filling over crust and bake. Top with sliced strawberries.

products.title: Classic Apple Pie
products.description: This classic apple pie is made with a flaky pastry crust and spiced apple filling.
products.instructions: Mix flour and butter to make crust. Mix apples, sugar, cinnamon, and flour for filling. Pour filling into crust and bake.
